thread.title: Ken Forster
thread.title_full: Antique Lamp Supply reviewed by Ken Forster

author: Ken Forster
title: Ken Forster
text:
Could not find specifications or description of "UNO" threads on a phenolic lamp socket. However from looking at the picture of the lamp socket, I had reason to believe that it would work for me. Turns out it did :)
Other than that, I was very satisfied with my ordering experience.
Very reasonable shipping and handling.
